quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Judy and Simpsons
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, judge, kind. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Wat is wrriten in the note mentioned below?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Life Sux

questions.question: Finish this famous Judge Judy quote from the title of her second book: Beauty Fades, ____ Is Forever!
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dumb

questions.question: 2006 saw which consecutive Judge Judy season?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 11th

questions.question: Judge Judy helped Judy break the record for the highest paid woman in the history of television.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who was not mentioned as one of Homers enemies in The Great Louse Detective, an episode of The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Power Plant Workers Union

questions.question: What kind of court did Judge Judy preside over for more than 25 years before becoming Americas most famous Judge?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Family Court

questions.question: This 1960s sitcom ran from 1966 to 1971 and starred Marlo Thomas, Bernie Kopell and Rosemary DeCamp.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: That Girl

questions.question: Who was in the grave, which Homer Simpson thought to be his mothers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walt Whitman

questions.question: Former The Golden Girls and Maude actress Bea Arthur was once a witness on Judge Judy.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which of these characters in  the animated sitcom The Simpsons is voiced by Dan Castellaneta?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mayor Diamond Joe Quimby

questions.question: The soap opera Peyton Place was based on a 1956 novel of the same name.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: When did Judge Judy first air on American television?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1996

questions.question: What is the upper monetary limit for a judgment in Judge Judys courtroom?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $5000

questions.question: Which of these episodes is not in the fourth season of The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Treehouse of Horror IV

questions.question: Who voices Agnes Skinner and Lindsay Naegle in Matt Groenings animated sitcom The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tress MacNeille

questions.question: Who played Sherice Ashe, one of Brandons many love interests, in Season 2 of the TV show Beverly Hills, 90210?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: From 1961 to 1966 Vince Edwards starred in what medical drama?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ben Casey

questions.question: On January 15, 1967 Super Bowl I was aired. Who were the teams that played?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kansas City and Green Bay

questions.question: The classic series of this show originally aired from 1963 to 1989 on BBC, a television film was made in 1996 and it reappeared as a television series in 2005. The main character has been played by 11 different actors including David Hartnell (the first) and Thomas Baker (the longest running from 1974 to 1981). Which is the show?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Doctor Who

questions.question: What sleazy TV show did Brenda do an interview for in Season 3 of Beverly Hills, 90210 that led to the gang being mad at her?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Back Story

questions.question: What TV station worker stalks Donna and holds her, Brandon, Tracy and others hostage at the CU News Station in Season 7 of Beverly Hills, 90210?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Evan

questions.question: The television game show Jeopardy debuted in the 1960s.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What character who helped Valerie and Dylan in the past got Valerie arrested for prostitution in Season 6 of Beverly Hills, 90210?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jay J. Jones

questions.question: What are the names of Dylans sister and her mother who make their first appearance in Season 4 of Beverly Hills, 90210?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Erica and Suzanne

questions.question: Petticoat Junction ran from 1963 to 1970.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Which 30-minute animated sitcom aired on ABC from 1960 to 1966?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Flintstones

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Simpsons and Daria

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sunday

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: G natural and A flat

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kamp Krusty

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jimbo

options.text: In a club, at one of Trents shows

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Through Jane

questions.question: What is Darias last name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Morgendorffer

questions.question: Daria attends Bromwell University after high school.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Why did David and Donna break up at the beginning of Season 8 of the teen TV show Beverly Hills, 90210?

options.text: David was forging her checks and stealing money.
Donna fell in love with Noah
David wanted to get back together with Valerie

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David was forging her checks and stealing money.

questions.question: What company agrees to sponsor Darias school, to help the school earn money?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ultra Cola

questions.question: Who is the model/actress/con artist that both Steve and David fall for in Season 9 of the teen drama Beverly Hills, 90210?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sophie

questions.question: Who played Ulysses S. Grant in the Civil War Re-enactment in The Simpsons?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Barney Gumble

questions.question: What high school does Daria attend?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lawndale High

questions.question: What question do Daria and Quinn both answer in their first days in Mr. Demartinos class?

options.text: What year did Columbus sail to America accidentally?
Who was our nations first president?
Explain the concept of Manifest Destiny

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Explain the concept of Manifest Destiny

questions.question: What is the name of Donnas store partner with whom David breaks up at the end of the show Beverly Hills, 90210 so that he can be with Donna?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Camille
